Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from repayments of short term debt
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments for derivative instrument investing activities
payments for proceeds from derivative instrument investing activities
proceeds from divestiture of businesses net of cash divested
proceeds from divestiture of interest in consolidated subsidiaries
proceeds from equity method investment dividends or distributions return of capital
proceeds from payments for divestiture of interest in consolidated subsidiaries
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Purchases of Investments: payments for proceeds from short term investments
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale of short term investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect
cash cash equivalents restricted cashand restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease disposal group including discontinued operations

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accrued taxes payable
increase decrease in other current assets
increase decrease in other current liabilities
increase decrease in other operating capital net
Deferred Income Taxes: increase decrease in deferred income taxes
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: deconsolidation gain loss amount net of tax
gain loss on sale of business
other operating activities cash flow statement
pension and other postretirement benefit expense
Stock-Based Compensation: excess tax benefit from share based compensation operating activities
